showScoreExcerpt:
“Within seconds of their opening number...we immediately want to know more – much more – about the seven autistic young adults at the center of ‘How to Dance in Ohio,’ the well-intentioned and periodically heartwarming musical...now at the Belasco Theatre under Sammi Cannold’s mostly solid direction. Unfortunately, despite the extraordinary efforts of a septet of terrific performers, we only get to know these characters just a little bit better.”
